TEXT.English: Airport Icons
TEXT.French: Icones d'Aéroport
TEXT.German: Flughafen-Symbol
TEXT.Italian: Icone Aeroporto
TEXT.Spanish: Airport Icons
TEXT.Finnish: Airport Icons

TEXT.English: When checked, places an airport icon above the city bars of cities that have an airport.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, place une icône représentant un aéroport au dessus de la barre d'info des Villes possédant un aéroport.
TEXT.German: Zeigt ein Flughafen-Symbol neben Städten an, die über einen Flughafen verfügen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, aggiunge una icona aeroportuale alle città che hanno un Aeroporto.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, places an airport icon above the city bars of cities that have an airport.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, places an airport icon above the city bars of cities that have an airport.

TEXT.English: Turns to Starvation
TEXT.French: Prévision de la Famine
TEXT.German: Runden bis Hungersnot
TEXT.Italian: Turni per la Carestia
TEXT.Spanish: Turns to Starvation
TEXT.Finnish: Turns to Starvation

TEXT.English: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche le nombre de tours restant avant que la population de la Ville soit réduite par la Famine.
TEXT.German: Zeigt an, in wie vielen Runden eine Stadt einen Bürger verliert, falls ihre Bevölkerung schrumpft
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra quanti turni mancano perché una città perda popolazione se sta diminuendo.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.

TEXT.English: Health
TEXT.French: Santé
TEXT.German: Gesundheit
TEXT.Italian: Salute
TEXT.Spanish: Health
TEXT.Finnish: Health

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, Affiche les conditions sanitaires ([ICON_HEALTHY] ou [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) de la Ville.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die derzeitige Gesundheit ([ICON_HEALTHY] oder [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) einer Stadt an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la salute risultante([ICON_HEALTHY] o [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) per la città.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.

TEXT.English: Happiness
TEXT.French: Moral
TEXT.German: Zufriedenheit
TEXT.Italian: Felicità
TEXT.Spanish: Happiness
TEXT.Finnish: Happiness

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche l'état du moral ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) de la population de la Ville.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die derzeitige Zufriedenheit ([ICON_HAPPY] oder [ICON_UNHAPPY]) einer Stadt an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la felicità risultante ([ICON_HAPPY] o [ICON_UNHAPPY]) per la città.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.

TEXT.English: Hurry Anger
TEXT.French: Mécontentement du Travail forcé
TEXT.German: Zwangsarbeit
TEXT.Italian: Rabbia da sacrifici
TEXT.Spanish: Hurry Anger
TEXT.Finnish: Hurry Anger

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche le nombre de population mécontente ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) à la suite de l'accélération de la production par le travail forcé. Affiche également le nombre de tours restant dans cette situation.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der wegen Zwangsarbeit unzufriedenen Bürger ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden an, bis diese sich wieder beruhigt haben
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di cittadini adirati ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) a causa dei sacrifici ed il numero di turni prima che si pacifichino.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.

TEXT.English: Draft Anger
TEXT.French: Mécontentement liés à Conscription
TEXT.German: Zwangsrekrutierung
TEXT.Italian: Rabbia da coscrizione
TEXT.Spanish: Draft Anger
TEXT.Finnish: Draft Anger

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche le nombre de population mécontente ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) en raison de la conscription et le nombre de tours restants dans cette situation.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der wegen Zwangsrekrutierung unzufriedenen Bürger ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden an, bis diese sich wieder beruhigt haben
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di cittadini adirati ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) a causa della coscrizione ed il numero di turni prima che si pacifichino.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.

TEXT.English: Growth Detail
TEXT.French: Détails démographiques
TEXT.German: Wachstum
TEXT.Italian: Crescita dettagliata
TEXT.Spanish: Growth Detail
TEXT.Finnish: Growth Detail

TEXT.English: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche des informations supplémentaires concernant la démographie de la Ville (accroissement, réduction, famine, stagnation).
TEXT.German: Zeigt detailliertere Informationen über das Wachstum einer Stadt an (Zunahme, Abnahme, Hungersnot, Stagnation).
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra più dettagli sulla crescita (crescita, decrescita, carestia, stagnazione).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).

TEXT.English: Base Values
TEXT.French: Valeurs de base
TEXT.German: Basiswerte
TEXT.Italian: Valori base
TEXT.Spanish: Base Values
TEXT.Finnish: Base Values

TEXT.English: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, la touche CTRL lorsque l'on passe sur la barre de la Ville avec le Pointeur permet d'afficher les valeurs de base (sans modificateurs) des ressources : production, echange, commerce, cout de maintenance, personnages illustres.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger bei gedrückter [STRG]-Taste über eine Stadt bewegt wird, die Basiswerte (ohne Modifikatoren) der folgenden Güter an: Produktion, Handel, Wirtschaft, Unterhalt, Große Persönlichkeiten
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, tenendo premuto CTRL mentre si posiziona il cursore su un oggetto ne mostra i valori base (privi di modificatori) di produzione, oro, commercio, mantenimento, grandi personaggi.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.

TEXT.English: Base Production
TEXT.French: Production de Base
TEXT.German: Grundproduktion
TEXT.Italian: Produzione base
TEXT.Spanish: Base Production
TEXT.Finnish: Base Production

TEXT.English: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche la production de base (en excluant le surplus, et les bonus liés à la déforestation où au travail forcé) en addition à la production du tour en cours.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Grundproduktion (ohne Überschuss, Zwangsarbeit und Waldrodung) zusätzlich zur Produktion der derzeitigen Runde an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la produzione base (escluse le quote da surplus, sacrifici e abbattimento alberi) come aggiunta alla produzione del turno corrente.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.

TEXT.English: Building Actual Effects
TEXT.French: Effets des Bâtiments
TEXT.German: Effektive Gebäudeerträge
TEXT.Italian: Effetti Reali degli Edifici
TEXT.Spanish: Building Actual Effects
TEXT.Finnish: Building Actual Effects

TEXT.English: When checked and a city is constructing a building, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], and [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] it will produce are displayed.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, et si la Ville est en train de produire un bâtiment, le taux actuel de [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], et [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] qu'il va produire va s'afficher sous le pointeur.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die effektiven Erträge von [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY] und [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] eines Gebäudes an, das gerade errichtet wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato ed in una città viene costruito un edificio, sarà mostrata la produzione effettiva di [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], e [ICON_GREATPEOPLE].
TEXT.Spanish: When checked and a city is constructing a building, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], and [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] it will produce are displayed.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked and a city is constructing a building, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], and [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] it will produce are displayed.

TEXT.English: City Bar
TEXT.French: Barre des Villes
TEXT.German: Stadtbalken
TEXT.Italian: Barra Cittadina
TEXT.Spanish: City Bar
TEXT.Finnish: City Bar

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche le coût ([ICON_CITIZEN] ou [ICON_GOLD]) et conséquences ([ICON_PRODUCTION] et [ICON_GOLD]) de l'accélération (travail forcé et/ou achat) de la production en cours de la Ville.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Kosten ([ICON_CITIZEN] oder [ICON_GOLD]) und Überschüsse ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und [ICON_GOLD]) einer Beschleunigung (Zwangsarbeit und/oder Kauf) der derzeitigen Produktion an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il costo ([ICON_CITIZEN] o [ICON_GOLD]) ed il surplus ([ICON_PRODUCTION] e [ICON_GOLD]) per l'accelerazione (da sacrifici e/o pagamenti) per l'oggetto in produzione.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.

TEXT.English: Include Current
TEXT.French: Tour actuel inclus
TEXT.German: Aktuelle Runde einbeziehen
TEXT.Italian: Includi corrente
TEXT.Spanish: Include Current
TEXT.Finnish: Include Current

TEXT.English: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, inclus la production du tour actuel dans le calcul des informations affichées ([ICON_PRODUCTION] et [ICON_GOLD]) dans le cas du travail forcé.
TEXT.German: Bezieht [ICON_PRODUCTION] einer Stadt aus der aktuellen Runde in die Berechnung des Produktionsüberschusses ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und/oder [ICON_GOLD]) ein, der aus der Produktionsbeschleunigung durch Zwangsarbeit entsteht
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, include il turno corrente quando calcola il surplus ([ICON_PRODUCTION] e/o [ICON_GOLD]) per l'accelerazione da sacrifici.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.

TEXT.English: Trade
TEXT.French: Echanges
TEXT.German: Handel
TEXT.Italian: Commercio
TEXT.Spanish: Trade
TEXT.Finnish: Trade

TEXT.English: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche des informations détaillées des Echanges : Total, Etranger, Etranger maritime. Chaque élément étant inclus dans le suivant (Commerce Etranger inclus le Commerce etragner maritime.
TEXT.German: Zeigt eine Aufschlüsselung des Handels in "Gesamt", "Ausland" und "Übersee" an, wobei der Wert für "Ausland" jenen für "Übersee" einschließt und "Gesamt" wiederum beide Werte in sich vereint
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra dei subtotali per il commercio: totale, estero, ed oltremare. Quello estero include quello d'oltremare, e quello totale include entrambi.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.

TEXT.English: Commerce
TEXT.French: Commerce
TEXT.German: Wirtschaft
TEXT.Italian: Oro
TEXT.Spanish: Commerce
TEXT.Finnish: Commerce

TEXT.English: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, le commerce total ([ICON_COMMERCE]) est affiché avant la répartition en ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], et [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt das gesamte Wirtschaftseinkommen ([ICON_COMMERCE]) vor den einzelnen Einkommensarten ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] und [ICON_ESPIONAGE]) an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra l'oro totale ([ICON_COMMERCE]) prima dei singoli tipi ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], e [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).

TEXT.English: Building Icons
TEXT.French: Icones pour les bâtiments
TEXT.German: Gebäude-Symbole
TEXT.Italian: Icone di edifici
TEXT.Spanish: Building Icons
TEXT.Finnish: Building Icons

TEXT.English: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, la Liste des Bâtiments est affichée sous forme d'icones à la place de leur noms.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Liste der Gebäude mit Symbolen statt Text an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la lista degli edifici viene visualizzata con le rispettive icone invece dei nomi.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.

TEXT.English: Culture Turns
TEXT.French: Expansion Culturelle
TEXT.German: Kultur
TEXT.Italian: Turni culturali
TEXT.Spanish: Culture Turns
TEXT.Finnish: Culture Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche le nombre de tours restants avant l'expansion des limites de la Ville en raison de sa Culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der Runden an, bis sich die Kulturgrenzen ([ICON_CULTURE]) einer Stadt erweitern
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di turni mancanti per la successiva espansione culturale ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).

TEXT.English: Great Person Turns
TEXT.French: Prévision des Personnages Illustres
TEXT.German: Große Persönlichkeiten
TEXT.Italian: Turni per Grandi Personaggi
TEXT.Spanish: Great Person Turns
TEXT.Finnish: Great Person Turns

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche le nombre de tours restants pour qu'un Personnage Illustre ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) naisse dans la Ville.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der Runden an, bis eine Stadt eine Große Persönlichkeit ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) hervorbringt
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di turni necessario perché la città generi il successivo Grande Personaggio([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).

TEXT.English: Specialists
TEXT.French: Specialistes
TEXT.German: Spezialisten
TEXT.Italian: Specialisti
TEXT.Spanish: Specialists
TEXT.Finnish: Specialists

TEXT.English: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche les icônes des spécialistes de la Villes (Citoyens et Personnages Illustres).
TEXT.German: Zeigt Symbole für die Spezialisten einer Stadt ab (sowohl für Bürger als auch für niedergelassene Große Persönlichkeiten)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra delle icone per gli Specialisti in città (sia i Cittadini Specialisti che i Grandi Personaggi trasformati in Super-Specialisti).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).

TEXT.English: Revolt Chance
TEXT.French: Probabilité de Révolte
TEXT.German: Unruhe-Wahrscheinlichkeit
TEXT.Italian: Possibilità di Rivolta
TEXT.Spanish: Revolt Chance
TEXT.Finnish: Revolt Chance

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, affiche la probabilité que les citoyens de la Ville se révoltent en raison des pressions culturelles.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Wahrscheinlichkeit an, dass in einer Stadt auf Grund von kulturellem Druck Unruhen ausbrechen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la probabilità che la Città si rivolti a causa della pressione culturale.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.

TEXT.English: Hide Instructions
TEXT.French: Instructions masquées
TEXT.German: Hinweise verbergen
TEXT.Italian: Nascondi Istruzioni
TEXT.Spanish: Hide Instructions
TEXT.Finnish: Hide Instructions

TEXT.English: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, masque les instructions des Villes sélectionnées, afin de laisser de la place pour les nouvelles informations sélectionnées dans les différentes options du mod.
TEXT.German: Verbirgt die Hinweise zur Auswahl von Städten und zur Anzeige der Basiswerte, um Platz für die neuen Informationen zu schaffen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nasconde le istruzioni per la selezione delle Città e mostra i valori base per fare posto alle nuove informazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
